author: Deborah WadeJohnson
text: Apple is giving Trump & his new social media app a platform on the App Store after he incited the deadly Jan. 6 insurrection... on social media. Join me & sign the @MoveOn petition to tell @Apple and @tim_cook to drop Trump’s social media app! https://t.co/8kftAJ0PmR
